data.text:
Careers

Siebel Developer

Do you want to build awesome Siebel CRM solutions?

Description

Mutatio has a storied Siebel CRM history and we continue to advance the Siebel state-of-the-art. We are looking for developers who have deep Siebel experience. Mutatio developers have the know-how, wisdom and technical chops to build mission critical enterprise Siebel solutions.

Requirements

Design, develop and support testing of mission critical enterprise Siebel systems

Maintain systems by identifying and correcting software defects

Support requirements analysis team as needed

Create technical specifications and unit test plans

Work with QA to align understanding of requirements and to develop system test plans

Work as part of an Agile development team to solve problems and develop project sprints

Follow and enforce established Siebel coding standards and naming conventions

Collaborate with UX team to enforce consistent look and feel of user interface

Collaborate with database and data quality teams to ensure enterprise business and technical goals are met

Collaborate with IT Operations to ensure hardware and software are aligned to deliver business requirements

Lead junior developers

Collaborate with project management team to communicate technical issues and drive timely solutions

Contribute to project design and technical documentation

Qualifications

A minimum of 10 years experience with Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)

A minimum of 10 years of experience architecting, designing, configuring, developing, unit testing, system integration testing, user acceptance testing, and deploying Siebel CRM applications

10 or more years of experience with Siebel eScript, EAI, Workflows, Business Services, Assignment Manager, SOAP and REST web services

Over 5 years of experience leading a team of developers, business analysts and test engineers in analyzing, designing, developing, testing and delivering Siebel CRM projects

At least 4 years of experience with Siebel Open UI IP15, JQuery, HTML and CSS

Expert experience with performing code reviews, requirement documents (RVTM, SyRS) reviews, design document reviews, test script/plan reviews and review other project documentation and deliverable

Experience working with Client IT Management and Business stakeholders during deployments, deliverable review and acceptance process.

Experience with at least three Siebel full application implementations

Solid working knowledge of relational databases (Oracle)

Strong leadership qualities and organizational skills as well as the ability to adapt quickly to changing priorities, assignments and roles

Solid analytical and problem-solving skills and ability to think strategically

Proactive, dynamic team leader with keen attention to details

Bachelor's degree from an accredited university

US Citizen
